thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Location, Nice Rooms
thread.title_full: Perfect Location, Nice Rooms - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Laurie M
title: Perfect Location, Nice Rooms
text:
We stayed here for 5 nights while visiting our daughter who was studying abroad for the semester. The location of this hotel was perfect on a quiet street yet close to pubs, restaurants, Buckingham Palace, Westminster and Victoria Underground Station. Super easy to get around the city via Oyster card from the Victoria Underground Station. There is also a bus terminal there and the train to Gatwick leaves/arrives there.
Rooms are nice and the bed we had was huge! Nice set-up to room with ample closet space and a mini-kitchette hidden behind doors. There was a coffee maker, tea kettle, microwave, mini-refrigerator and sink plus plates, cups, silverware etc... A nice place to come back to after a long day of walking around London.
